item.title: 1 The Singer
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 1 The Singer 21 November 1974 am in Chuang Tzu Auditorium HE IS ONE, HE IS OMKAR, THE SUPREME TRUTH. HE IS THE CREATOR, BEYOND FEAR, BEYOND RANCOR. HIS IS THE TIMELESS FORM. NEVER BORN, SELF-CREATING. HE IS ATTAINED BY THE GURU’S GRACE. HE WAS TRUTH BEFORE THE AGES AND AS TIME RAN ITS COURSE. NANAK SAYS, NOW IS HE TRUTH ETERNAL, AND FOREVER WILL HE BE.

item.title: 10 The Lure of the Infinite
item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌CHAPTER 10 The Lure of the Infinite 30 November 1974 am in Chuang Tzu Auditorium THERE ARE MILLIONS OF UNDERWORLDS AND INFINITE SKIES ABOVE. THE VEDAS SAY MILLIONS HAVE SEARCHED AND SEARCHED, ONLY TO END IN EXHAUSTION. THE HOLY BOOKS CLAIM EIGHTEEN THOUSAND WORLDS BUT ONLY ONE POWER BEHIND ALL CREATION. IF ANYTHING COULD BE WRITTEN WE WOULD KEEP THE ACCOUNT, BUT ALL ESTIMATES ARE DESTRUCTIBLE.

item.title: 2 The Weight of a Flower
3 Solving the Riddle
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 3 Solving the Riddle 23 November 1974 am in Chuang Tzu Auditorium THE LORD IS TRUTH. TRUTH IS HIS NAME. HIS PRAISES ARE SUNG IN ENDLESS WAYS. EVEN WHILE PRAISING THEY ASK FOR MORE AND MORE, AND THE LORD KEEPS ON GIVING. THEN WHAT OFFERING CAN WE MAKE TO GAIN A GLIMPSE OF HIS COURT? AND WHAT LANGUAGE SHALL WE SPEAK TO ENDEAR US TO HIM?

item.title: 4 Some Other Ganges
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 4 Some Other Ganges 24 November 1974 am in Chuang Tzu Auditorium IF I HAVE SUCCEEDED IN ATTAINING HIS PLEASURE, I HAVE BATHED IN ALL THE HOLY RIVERS. AND IF I FAIL TO PLEASE HIM, WHY SHOULD I BATHE AND ADORN MYSELF? IN THIS WHOLE CREATED UNIVERSE, NOTHING IS ATTAINED WITHOUT ACTIONS; BUT HE WHO LISTENS TO BUT ONE TEACHING OF THE GURU,

item.title: 5 The Art Of Listening
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 5 The Art Of Listening 25 November 1974 am in Chuang Tzu Auditorium THROUGH LISTENING OCCULT POWERS AND SAINTLINESS ARE GAINED, HEAVEN AND EARTH ARE MADE STABLE, AND THE WORLD AND LOWER WORLDS REVOLVE. THROUGH LISTENING DEATH DOES NOT TOUCH. NANAK SAYS, THROUGH LISTENING DEVOTEES ATTAIN BLISS, AND SIN AND SORROW ARE DESTROYED. THROUGH LISTENING VISHNU, BRAHMA AND INDRA CAME INTO BEING, THE MOST SINFUL WILL SING HIS PRAISES,

item.title: 6 Only Contemplating Can Know
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 6 Only Contemplating Can Know 26 November 1974 am in Chuang Tzu Auditorium THE STATE OF CONTEMPLATION CANNOT BE EXPRESSED; WHOEVER ATTEMPTS IT WILL AFTERWARDS REPENT. THERE IS NO PAPER, NO PEN, NO WRITER, THAT CAN PENETRATE SUCH A STATE. THE NAME OF THE FLAWLESS ONE IS SUCH THAT ONLY CONTEMPLATING CAN KNOW.IT. THROUGH CONTEMPLATION IS REMEMBRANCE BORN IN MIND AND INTELLECT, AND AWARENESS OF THE UNIVERSE ACQUIRED.

item.title: 7 The Journey Ends
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 7 The Journey Ends 27 November 1974 am in Chuang Tzu Auditorium FIVE ARE THE TESTS AND THE MINISTERS; THEY GAIN SHELTER AND RESPECT AT HIS DOOR; THEY DECORATE THE KING’S COURT. ATTENTION IS THE GURU OF THE FIVE. WHATEVER YOU WILL SAY, CONSIDER WELL FIRST, FOR THE DOINGS OF THE DOER ARE IMPOSSIBLE TO ASSESS. RELIGION UPHOLDS THE EARTH AND IS BORN OF COMPASSION.

item.title: 8 Countless Ways
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 8 Countless Ways 28 November 1974 am in Chuang Tzu Auditorium THERE ARE COUNTLESS WAYS TO REPEAT HIS NAME AND EXPRESS DEVOTION, COUNTLESS WAYS OF WORSHIP AND PURIFICATION. THERE ARE COUNTLESS SCRIPTURES AND COUNTLESS MOUTHS TO RECITE THEM, COUNTLESS WAYS OF YOGA TO MAKE THE MIND DISPASSIONATE. THERE ARE COUNTLESS DEVOTEES WHO CONTEMPLATE HIS VIRTUES AND KNOWLEDGE, COUNTLESS WHO ARE VIRTUOUS AND GENEROUS.

item.title: 9 Dyed In His Hue
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 9 Dyed In His Hue 29 November 1974 am in Chuang Tzu Auditorium IF THE BODY IS COVERED WITH DIRT, WATER CAN WASH IT AWAY. IF THE CLOTHES ARE SOILED AND POLLUTED, SOAP AND WATER CAN WASH THEM CLEAN. EVEN IF MIND IS FILLED WITH EVIL, LOVE FOR HIS NAME CAN DYE YOU IN HIS HUE. SAINT OR SINNER ARE NO EMPTY WORDS; ALL OUR ACTIONS HAVE BEEN RECORDED.
